skins.shipDescription: Arethusa-class light cruiser - Aurora, pennant number 12
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Aurora of the Royal Navy, fourth ship of the Arethusa-class. You are welcome to call me the "Goddess of Dawn," but please forget any nasty-sounding nicknames you might hear like the "Silver Phantom." Commander, perhaps you are familiar with some of the other names that I've been called?
skins.acquisition: Greetings, Commander. I am the fourth ship of the Arethusa-class light cruisers, Aurora. From now on, I shall serve as your secretary. Please feel free to ask anything of me~
skins.login: My name symbolises the break of dawn. Ehehe~ Do you feel more energetic from seeing me?
skins.details: Commander, is there anything I can help you with regarding equipment?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Eastern Radiance? Oh, it's a great place. Mm... for example...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Even though I don't mind if you stare at me, please do your work properly~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hold still, Commander, there's something stuck on your cheek... There! Now, please do your best at work~
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, want to take a break and come water the flowers with me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander! I... I'm going to be mad! Jeez! I'll really get mad!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, please relax and take a seat. This is a special place for just the two of us... Just kidding, did I get your heart racing just now? Ehehe~
skins.acquisition: Commander, please relax and take a seat. This is a special place for just the two of us... Just kidding, did I get your heart racing just now? Ehehe~
skins.login: Do you feel a little better when I'm by your side, Commander? Hehe~
skins.details: As you know, Commander, the rose petals in the finger bowl came from roses that I planted. Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: I've adorned your office with more than just roses... Azaleas, peonies, cyclamen, carnations... Is it not better to foster a warm and harmonious atmosphere?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Elegance, grace, and strength of spirit... I must work harder in order to become your supporting pillar.
skins.secretaryIdle3: A lively festival can be quite enjoyable, but there's also value in relaxing in a spacious room.
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you know what the embroidery here means? Hehe~

skins.shipDescription: I have long prepared for this day... Commander, would you like to listen to my storytelling?
skins.acquisition: I have long prepared for this day... Commander, would you like to listen to my storytelling?
skins.login: Commander, welcome back. Please take your time, I only just got here myself.
skins.details: My outfit is a bit surprising? Ehehe, from now on, you'll learn more and more about a different side of me~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, would you like to eat hotpot? If you're not good with spice, I'll prepare a two-sided pot~
skins.secretaryIdle2: If you're tired, why don't you enjoy a mandarin while listening to me read a story?
skins.secretaryTouch: Eh? What's the matter? Ah, I was just thinking... it'd be great if things could stay like this next year, and the year after that, and forever more...

skins.shipDescription: I've always believed that music is unique in its power to touch one's heart, so I decided to learn the violin. Commander, please enjoy my performance.
skins.acquisition: I've always believed that music is unique in its power to touch one's heart, so I decided to learn the violin. Commander, please enjoy my performance.
skins.details: Commander, I often perform in the main plaza. It'd be nice if you could come and listen.
skins.secretaryIdle1: The pigeons always seem to gather to the sound of music. Hehe, turns out that they're hungry.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, are you interested in learning an instrument? I'd recommend the piano so that you can accompany me!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, if you ever find yourself lost and confused in the dark, you can always seek out my music!
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you tired of working? Well, is there anything you'd like to listen to?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Jeez, Commander, this is going to get in the way of my performance...

skins.shipDescription: "Next, Aurora will perform something you've never seen before - traditional Sichuan mask-changing opera!" Hehe... Commander, I look like the real deal, right?
skins.acquisition: "Next, Aurora will perform something you've never seen before - traditional Sichuan mask-changing opera!" Hehe... Commander, I look like the real deal, right?
skins.login: What kind of performance should I prepare for today? I have too many things to choose from...
skins.details: The operas are just a glimpse of the Dragon Empery's five thousand rich years of culture and history... As a ship with a deep connection with the Dragon Empery, I hope to share the charm of these ancient traditions with many more people!
skins.secretaryIdle1: One of the specialities of Sichuan opera is something called "mask changing." It lets you quickly portray different emotions, or even different characters. Hehe, it took a lot of practice to be able to do this.
skins.secretaryIdle2: "Behind each minute on the stage is ten years of practice." The Dragon Empery's old adages are quite thought-provoking...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, do you know how many different types of plays there are in the Dragon Empery?
skins.secretaryTouch: What are these weapons for? Um, right now, I mostly play the flower girl character, but I hope to be able to play some warriors too! Hehe~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: C-Commander?! If you keep this up, I'm going to use my polearm and sword, and um... it's going to hurt!
